definition: to be on the low side/to be inadequate (e.g. of a salary)
to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations
low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline

sentences.english: During this time your body temperature is still low, but your blood pressure is sharply rising.
sentences.chinese: 這段時間裏你的體溫偏低，但血壓驟什。

sentences.english: People undergoing cancer therapy may have low blood-cell counts.
sentences.chinese: 正接受癌症治療的人血細胞數目會偏低。

sentences.english: The negative serological negative conversion rate of syphilis treatment was low.
sentences.chinese: 潛伏梅毒治療血清陰轉率偏低。

sentences.english: Conclusion Treatment rates was low in Chongming traditional Chinese medicine hospital of traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 結論崇明縣中醫醫院中醫治療率偏低。

sentences.english: Last year's cereal harvest in Niger was 26 percent below the previous year.
sentences.chinese: 去年，尼日爾穀物產量比前一年偏低26%。

sentences.english: A possible relationship exists between human aggressive behaviour and low serum cholesterol lev-el.
sentences.chinese: 人的攻擊行爲與血清膽固醇濃度偏低可能有關。

sentences.english: If you suspect that you have a low testosterone level, consult your doctor.
sentences.chinese: 如果你懷疑自己體內睾丸素偏低，請諮詢個人醫生。

sentences.english: Pregnant women also have temporarily low IgG2 levels.
sentences.chinese: 孕婦的IgG2水平都會暫時地偏低。

sentences.english: Millikan used a value about 1% too low.
sentences.chinese: 密立根所用的值大約偏低1%。

sentences.english: The testing period of chemical titration was longer, and determined bromine content of BBR was lower.
sentences.chinese: 化學滴定法測試周期較長，分析結果偏低。

sentences.english: Compared with Picea likiangensis var. linzhiensis community, the species diversity of Cupressus gigantea community was lower.
sentences.chinese: 與林芝雲杉林比較，巨柏羣落物種多樣性偏低。

sentences.english: There was a great difference or lowness among the other cultivars and they couldn't be pollinated-variety one another.
sentences.chinese: 其他品種間差異較大或偏低，不可以做相互授粉品種。

sentences.english: It was not favorable for metal phase agglomeration and growth when C/O ratio was too high or too low.
sentences.chinese: 球團配碳比偏低或偏高都不利於鎳鐵顆粒的團聚長大。

sentences.english: What should leucocyte on the low side notice?
sentences.chinese: 白血球偏低應注意什麼？

sentences.english: The comprehensive factors resulting in the low seed setting rate of wide rice in Gaozhou were discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文對導致結實率偏低的綜合因素進行了討論。

sentences.english: The low amylose content in some combinations was also a big problem.
sentences.chinese: 少數組合還存在直鏈澱粉含量偏低的問題。

definition: to be on the high side/to be unusually high
low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
to rise again after a fall/to pick up/rally (stock market etc)
